nodes.documentation:
he User Contract enables the entering of a deployed swap along with the wrapping of Ether.  This
ontract was specifically made for drct.decentralizedderivatives.org to simplify user metamask 
alls
nodes.name: UserContract

nodes.documentation:
dev Value must be sent with Initiate and enter the _amount(in wei) ?
param _swapAdd is the address of the deployed contract created from the Factory contract
param _amount is the amount of the base tokens(short or long) in the ?
wap. For wrapped Ether, this is wei.
nodes.name: Initiate
